text: (viśvāsavantayini!) dharma kāraṇāvanhi oba samaga viruddhava yuddha nokarannanṭada, obagē nivesvalin obava piṭamaṁ nokaḷa ayaṭada, oba kṛtagna novanu yayida, ovun samaga oba sādhāraṇa lesa kaṭayutu nokaḷa yutuya yayida, allāh obava vaḷakvā hæriyē næta. niyata vaśayenma allāh viniścayakaruvanva priya karanneku vaśayenma siṭinnēya
